content: X-CX C Ceiling clip with nail Ceiling clip with pre-mounted nail ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Nail with cut point tip for good penetration in soft concrete Dome design for improved guidance while driving the nail Suitable for use with a wide range of Hilti fastening tools Applications Suspending ceilings from concrete and concrete over metal deck using ceiling wire hangers Fastening and suspending light-duty electrical and mechanical services ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material: Carbon steel Application: Acoustic ceiling Base materials: Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck) Technical Data | Application | Acoustic ceiling | Material | Carbon steel | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck) | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Approvals | ICC-ES | Point type | Cut point | Fastener shank diameter | 0.14 in | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2177352 - Ceiling clip X-CX C27 - Package Size 100 pc - 3578975 - KIT X-CX C27 + 6.8/11 M YELLOW - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Ceiling clip X-CX C27 - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal yellow - 3806907 - KIT X-CX C27 + 6.8/11 M10T - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Ceiling clip X-CX C27 - 1000x DX Cartridge 6,8/11 M10 T titanium C-T - 3578976 - KIT X-CX C27 + 6.8/11 M RED - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Ceiling clip X-CX C27 - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal red
